resources.string:
Hi, my name is Vitalii. 

I love potatoes with mushrooms. 

Also I'm from St. Petersburg. St. Petersburg is a cultural capital of Russia. 

Fun fact in St. Petersburg there is more bridges than in Venice. 

Now I live in Berlin but I'm still travelling to St. Petersburg 2 times a year. 

Ask me if you want to know where to go in St. Petersburg. 

Another fun fact about St. Petersburg. There is a pizzeria called "Krank Pizza" which is named after Ninja Turtles series. 

I miss St. Petersburg very often. Especially in summer when there are White Nights.
